message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $8,000 to us. However, I understand the importance of making this opportunity accessible to you, so I'm proposing a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $7,200. This exclusive deal won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to potentially welcoming you as a valued customer.
